summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2918 for the improvement of Alley in Block 28, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 4, being the alley between 15th Avenue North and 16th Avenue North, from East Prospect Street to East Highland Drive, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with concrete; by providing for the necessary surface drainage; by doing such grading as may be necessary, under Ordinance No. 35233, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
